text.section: The Department shall collect an inmate's earnings.

From an inmate's earnings, the Department shall:
reimburse the county or State for the cost of providing food, lodging, and clothing to the inmate in a local correctional facility;
pay court ordered payments for support of dependents; and
pay court ordered payments for restitution.

The Department shall:
credit to the inmate's account any balance that remains after paying the items in subsection (b)(1) through (3) of this section; and
pay the balance in the inmate's account to the inmate within 15 days after the inmate is released.
